name: Resource Dice
description:
There was a web build but it doesn't work and I didn't have time to fix it, I will add one once the jam is over.

Roll the dice and cross your fingers, as you fill orders your given. 

Tutorial on game title screen. The more resources needed to fill an order, the more points its worth. As you get more points, more colours of dice will appear, each colour has its own group of items.

This game was only made to run in 16:9, other formats may break that game
